answers.answer: Hi!Your daughter suffers from chronic constipation and yes, it can be really painful at time due to trapped gas. Chronic constipation can be due to diet poor in roughage or fiber and also due to dehydration. A high roughage with low water too could be a cause.  Diabetes and hypothyroidism, colon disorders, irritable bowel syndrome, diverticular diseases, cancers, severe acidity etc can all cause constipation. It can also be due to milk allergy and other food allergies. Too many tape worms or round worms forming a bolus or ball could also be the cause. It is important to run tests to find the cause. Do discuss this with your GI doctor and get her examined. Take care!
